did.unittitle: Collection of miscellaneous slides of Brooklyn

physdesc.extent: ten items housed in one box.

did.abstract: The Collection of miscellaneous slides of Brooklyn contains both black-and-white and color slides depicting various buildings and locations in Brooklyn, dating from circa 1900 to 1980. Exterior and detail views of the Brooklyn Historical Society (formerly the Long Island Historical Society) building are represented in the collection.

scopecontent.p: The Collection of miscellaneous slides of Brooklyn contains both black-and-white and color slides depicting various buildings and locations in Brooklyn, dating from circa 1900 to 1980.
